my-crypto-heroes.Description: My Crypto HeroesÂ (MCH) is a Blockchain PRG game. Collect and train historical Heroes of the world and fight with them. All the time and passion you invest into the game will turn into real assets here. Get special and legendary items into your to equip, compose the ultimate unbeatable team formations and challenge epic battles to conquer the crypto world!

token-sale.Description: The sale of tokens to investors and speculators, in exchange for cryptocurrencies such as Ether.
